item.bountifulbaubles.disintegration_tab: §9Craft with dungeon loot or certain other items to convert them into spectral silt
item.bountifulbaubles.magic_mirror.wrong: You sense that you are too far from home to return.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_obsidian.to: §9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback when held or equipped in curio slot.
§aEveryone knows that blue LEDs make your PC run faster.
item.bountifulbaubles.ankh_charm.tooltip: §9Grants immunity to most negative status effects.
item.bountifulbaubles.mixed_dragon_scale: §aInteresting, the bezoar has fused with the scale and made it appear to be two different colors.
item.bountifulbaubles.wormhole_mirror.to: §aYou can feel the void staring back at you.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_ankh.toolti: Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.gloves_dexterity.t: §9Allows you to switch between items without resetting attack cooldown.
item.bountifulbaubles.broken_black_drago: §aBlack dragon scales are said to protect against withering. Perhaps this broken one could be repaired?
item.bountifulbaubles.amulet_sin_pride.t: §9Grants sinful buff (+damage, +armor) while at full health.
item.bountifulbaubles.phylactery_charm.t: §9If held and right-clicked, functions as a magic mirror, but deals damage to you and teleports you instantly.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_ankh.toolti: §9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback and most negative status effects when held or equipped in curio slot.
item.bountifulbaubles.wormhole_mirror.to: §9Right click while sneaking to teleport to another player.
item.bountifulbaubles.gloves_dexterity.t: §aAnd they say dexterity isn't a useful stat.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_ankh.toolti: Can be repaired in an anvil with obsidian.
item.bountifulbaubles.ring_free_action.t: §9Grants immunity to slowness and levitation and allows free movement through cobwebs.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_cobalt.tool: Can be repaired in an anvil with iron ingots.
item.bountifulbaubles.phylactery_charm.t: §9Also functions as a Broken Heart when equipped.
item.bountifulbaubles.obsidian_skull.too: §aHolding this makes you feel vaguely nervous.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_obsidian.to: Can be repaired in an anvil with obsidian.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_cobalt.tool: Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.amulet_sin_wrath.t: §9Grants sinful buff (+damage, +armor) after you deal a critical hit.
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_cobalt.tool: §9Grants immunity to knockback when held or equipped in curio slot.
item.bountifulbaubles.broken_heart.parti: §aYou feel revitalized. (Regained some lost max health)
item.bountifulbaubles.shield_obsidian.to: Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.broken_heart.full_: §aYou feel good as new! (Regained all lost max health)
§9Grants immunity to slowness and +7% move speed.
item.bountifulbaubles.phylactery_charm.t: §9Does not work in situations where a magic mirror could not teleport you.
item.bountifulbaubles.apple.tooltip.0: §9Grants immunity to hunger status effect, and nausea.
item.bountifulbaubles.broken_heart.toolt: §9Lethal damage destroys empty heart containers instead.
item.bountifulbaubles.wormhole_mirror.to: §9Right click to teleport to your spawn point.
item.bountifulbaubles.potion_wormhole.to: §aDoes not, however, guarantee that where they are is safe.
item.bountifulbaubles.vitamins.tooltip.0: §9Grants immunity to weakness and mining fatigue.
item.bountifulbaubles.obsidian_skull.too: §9Grants immunity to burning and 50% resistance to fire damage. (Does not protect against lava)
item.bountifulbaubles.balloon.tooltip.0: §9Increases jump height and decreases fall damage slightly.
item.bountifulbaubles.magic_mirror.toolt: §aIt may bend space at will, but it can't make ugly things beautiful, unfortunately for you.
item.bountifulbaubles.phylactery_charm.t: §9When equipped, teleports you to your spawn point.
